9mm Handgun.description: A standard 9mm handgun. It's straightforward, reliable, and does what it's supposed to: shoot bullets. No magic, no frills, just pure firepower.

Antique Longbow (Tattered Longbow).description: An old, weathered longbow that has seen better days. It's reliable, sturdy, and does what it's supposed to do: shoot arrows. Nothing fancy, just good old-fashioned archery.

Arrow of Enthusiastic Double Gonorrhea.description: Arrow of Enthusiastic Double Gonorrhea. This is a regular arrow, but the tip is dipped in a poison that will inflict you with Enthusiastic Double Gonorrhea. Trust me on this. You don't want Enthusiastic Double Gonorrhea. It doesn't kill you, but you'll want it to. It sets your genitals aflame. Literally. And then it heals that area of your body over and over. The only way to remove the disease is to, uh, geld yourself. Or pass it on to someone else.

weaponAbilities.description: Upon a successful hit, the target must make a Stamina saving throw (DC 15) or be inflicted with Enthusiastic Double Gonorrhea. The disease causes the target's genitals to ignite with flames, dealing 1d4 fire damage every turn until the disease is cured. The target must spend an action to make another Constitution saving throw at the start of each of their turns to attempt to heal. The disease heals and reignites the afflicted area repeatedly. The only known cures are self-gelding or passing the disease to another creature.
weaponAbilities.effect: Inflicts Enthusiastic Double Gonorrhea on hit

Assassin's Kazoo (Echoing Flute Dagger).description: A dagger with a melodic twist, the Assassin's Kazoo can play a tune that distracts enemies after a successful hit, giving your allies an advantage. It's perfect for the stealthy bard who enjoys a good stab-and-sing routine.

weaponAbilities.description: After a successful attack, the wielder can play a tune to distract nearby enemies, giving allies a +1d10 advantage on their next action.

Bipolar Slingshot (Slingshot of Surprise.description: This slingshot has a knack for surprising its wielder as much as its targets. On a roll of 10, it deals maximum damage and delivers a surprise effect, such as knocking the target prone. Great for those who like to keep their opponents—and themselves—on their toes.

weaponAbilities.description: On a roll of 10, the slingshot deals maximum damage and has a surprise effect, such as knocking the target prone.
weaponAbilities.effect: Max damage and surprise effect on roll of 10

Bolt of Ophiotaurus.description: The Bolt of Ophiotaurus. This is 1 of 100. This item acts as a regular crossbow bolt unless it is shot directly into the eye of a deity. Upon a successful strike to the god's eye, the deity's invulnerability pauses for fifteen seconds.

weaponAbilities.description: If shot directly into the eye of a deity, the deity's invulnerability is paused for fifteen seconds.

Bolt of Petrify Rock Class.description: A Bolt of Petrify Rock Class is a crossbow bolt that imbues a rock-class target with the 'Petrified' status condition. The bolt vanishes in a puff of smoke after impact. This type of bolt is more expensive than bolts designed to injure rock-class creatures.

weaponAbilities.description: Upon impact, the target is imbued with the 'Petrified' status condition. The bolt vanishes in a puff of smoke after impact.
weaponAbilities.effect: Imbues Petrified status on rock-class targets

Bugspray/Lighter Combo.description: An improvised weapon that combines the flammable properties of bug spray with the ignition capabilities of a lighter. This combo can cause panic among weaker foes, possibly causing them to flee in terror.

weaponAbilities.description: Can cause panic and disarray among weaker foes, possibly causing them to flee.
weaponAbilities.effect: May cause weaker foes to flee

Echo Hammer.description: A mighty hammer that resonates with a deep, echoing boom. Each swing sends vibrations through the air, and a solid hit releases a deafening sonic boom. Perfect for those who like their enemies disoriented and reeling.

weaponAbilities.description: On a successful hit, can choose to release a sonic boom to deafen the target, imposing a -2 penalty to their next action.

Enchanted Repeating Crossbow of the Scav.weaponName: Enchanted Repeating Crossbow of the Scavenger Mother of Mothers
Enchanted Repeating Crossbow of the Scav.description: This is a unique item. This is a repeating, ranged weapon. It has the buffet enchantment, meaning it will not run out of basic ammunition. You may load and fire additional ammunition types to use with this weapon, though any special bonuses will only apply to the stock ammunition. It is said that the long-forgotten goddess Nekhebit is both jealous and terrible. When the elf mothers chose to abandon Nekhebit and instead worship Apito, the Oak Goddess, it is written Nekhebit grew enraged. The mighty vulture goddess blamed the male-dominated high elf court for causing her worshippers to stray. As a result, she cursed their seed, thus creating what is today known as the Fae Diaspora. There are dozens of elf and fairy breeds, all of whom may trace their lineage back to the early high elf court, whose cursed offspring sowed the universe. This crossbow is rumored to have been given to Nekhebit's last warrior guardian as a gift for remaining true to her faith. This item may only be wielded by a female. For every female in your party, up to thirty, this item's damage and firing speed is increased by 25 percent. Your strength increases base damage 1.5X more than a standard crossbow (1d8). +10 Dexterity when wielded. +8 Strength when wielded. Casts Birth Defect on monster types who generate or birth additional monsters.

weaponAbilities.description: Casts Birth Defect on monster types who generate or birth additional monsters.
weaponAbilities.effect: Reduces the ability of monsters to generate or birth additional monsters.

specialEffects.description: For every female in your party, up to thirty, this item's damage and firing speed is increased by 25 percent.
The weapon will not run out of basic ammunition. Special bonuses only apply to stock ammunition.
